p: Study of the structural features of the transmembrane domain of M2 (a.a. 18–60) and nearby areas at pH 7.5 revealed the presence of a nonstructural N-terminal region (a.a. 18–23), a channel-forming transmembrane helix (a.a. 25–46), a short flexible loop (a.a. 47–50) and a C-terminal aliphatic helix (a.a. 51–59) [ 104].
